description: A shell script used to start and stop the Home Security HNAP process named 'xhs'. It manages service lifecycle events such as start, stop, and restart, and interacts with system events and logging functions. It specifically handles IPv4 status changes to determine when to start or stop the process.

methods.name: service_start
methods.description: Starts the 'xhs' service if its conditions are met, sets system event states.

methods.name: service_stop
methods.description: Stops the 'xhs' service and updates system event states.

methods.name: handle_ipv4_status
methods.description: Handles changes in IPv4 status to trigger start or stop of the service.
